newsitem.title: USA: Ballot questions and bond referendums by state.
newsitem.headline: Ballot questions and bond referendums by state.

text.p: The following is a list of upcoming ballot initiatives and measures. The list will be updated as information is made available.
P - passed. D - defeated. NA - not available
--Pinellas Cty, Fla., 10-year extension of one-cent sales tax increase for schools.
--$2.95 million Runnemede school district bonds for school renovations.
--$145 million Woodbridge school bonds for renovations and new construction.
--$28.5 million Evesham Township School Board bonds for school additions and repairs.
--$2.65 million Northern Highlands Regional High School, in Allendale, school bonds for technology and physical education improvements.
--$10 million Willingboro school bonds for renovations. PENNSYLVANIA
--Evesham Township School Board bonds for school renovations.
